website_summaries.verdict: Flexible, reusable one-size earplugs for all that come in 10 pieces, making up 5 pairs.
pros: Work for showers, swimming, and other water activities
Form to ear well and seal tightly
cons: Thin flanges, could tear after a few uses
Small, can push down into ear easily to get trapped
Slip, slide, and fall out when used for sleeping

customer_reviews.title: keeps water out
customer_reviews.text: This may seem weird, but I use these in the shower! I have always had problems with water getting so deep in my ears while showering that I felt like I was underwater all day long. Nothing I did to get the water out worked, so I looked for a solution to keep the water out in the first place. These do the trick perfectly, and when people ask how I clean my ears, I say, "Cautiously and carefully."
customer_reviews.author: tautologist

customer_reviews.title: Fit was just OK
customer_reviews.text: Prone to ear infections, I got these to use in the shower. I'm a 5"4, 120 lb woman & they let water in, so even though they say they're adult size, I think they'd be too small for most adults. They did block some water out, though
customer_reviews.author: 2Under2♡♡

customer_reviews.title: ... into the straight portion of a plug it allows easy insertion of the earplug
customer_reviews.text: After inserting a short Qtip cottonless piece into the straight portion of a plug it allows easy insertion of the earplug. I had to do this since otherwise would not easily be inserted since the straight portion of the plug is too soft to stay straight. Otherwise, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Voll

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I swim a mile in the pool 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I swim a mile in the pool 3 times a week and these ear plugs work as good or better than the type I have been using. These plugs keep the water out and does diminish the sound but I can still hear the lifeguard whistle. Also, very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Swimmer

customer_reviews.title: Squashed and Squeezed
customer_reviews.text: These things should be shipped in a hard case and not all squeezed in a tiny plastic bag. None of them were round like the shape in the picture, they arrived squashed. They are also larger than most other brands. Can’t complain for the low price. They are what they are for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lonely Planet

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck in ears very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to push in too far. Wound up having to yank one out with tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Practically indestructible. Comfortable. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I work in nightclubs and they have been perfect. Can easily be washed and sterilized for reuse. Wax wipes right off. Their life only ends when you lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Used for travel - just right
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend - speech therapist. Comfortable due to flexibility and size.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Works Okay
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work okay but on my first swim lost one during the swim. Not sure what to do to keep them in. Weather has turn cold and the lake is beyond chilly. Will give them another try in the spring. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hect

customer_reviews.title: Earplugs leaked
customer_reviews.text: These leaked and I got swimmers ear. It may be because my ear canal is small and these didn't fit properly. I have ordered a brand that worked for me in the past.
customer_reviews.author: JimG

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for lap swimming
customer_reviews.text: I have used these type of earplugs for swimming laps in the past with great success. These however are lower quality. The material is thinner and flimsy. They don’t stay in the ear as well and water tends to seep in behind them. So if you are using them for swimming you may want to try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Flexible, comfortable, good fit & feel, reasonable price. I would have liked a bit longer stem to pull them out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: These don't fit in my ears properly. You would ...
customer_reviews.text: These don't fit in my ears properly. You would think they would but I couldn't get to stay in and regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Layne

customer_reviews.title: The earplugs work great for swimming
customer_reviews.text: The earplugs work great for swimming. Just wanted to let everyone know, it does not come with a case. They are just stuffed in a small plastic bag that once opened will not close again.
customer_reviews.author: Wyldfyre

customer_reviews.title: Soft! Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: The earplugs are nice and soft, because of that, you get a nice comfortable fit...
customer_reviews.author: Aprince

customer_reviews.title: Use them frequently and they allow total silence and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Use them frequently and they allow total silence and a relaxing swim.
customer_reviews.author: diane robie

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit, does not leave my ears sore and seals well, no more water in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: ProfEng

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: Keeps water out of your ears, but 3 uses later...let’s water right in
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: No ear dripping here
customer_reviews.text: Softy rubber material, keeps the water out, that's all I can ask for....
customer_reviews.author: ZO THE VIKING

customer_reviews.title: Works well and fit is good
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the water out of ears and stays snug if put in correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Warriors Fan

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: They meet my need and the price is good. But they are softer than I expected so it takes some practice to insert into my ears. They prevents waters from getting in when taking showers. I have not tried them under water yet.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work how I need them to work for my swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Anita W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work fine and happy with the price. Be patient with the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I go swimming with these. They don't always stay ...
customer_reviews.text: I go swimming with these. They don't always stay put and don't keep all the water out. They send you a lot of them though. They're only okay.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy product. Have to insert deep in the ear ...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy product. Have to insert deep in the ear for plugs to stay on & not fall off. Kept it only because I did not want to deal with sending them back and also pay for the return shipping cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lucas

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: The earplugs work very well, they easily fit in the ear and do not cause any irritation. They also do not leak water, I recommend this earplugs for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to swim three times a week and they work great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both use these to swim three times a week and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H. Tiner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy on my ears, and do the job great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No irritation
customer_reviews.text: I have used these before and find them excellent. They are super soft and do not irritate the ears
customer_reviews.author: Laura Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is too big to stock it in, so it keeps falling.
customer_reviews.author: joaquin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: work better than the ones I purchased at Big 5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Plug does fall out of ear canal. Does not fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Cadet

product_meta.title: Natuworld Silicone Earplugs Swimmers - 5 Pairs(10PCS) Soft and Flexible Ear Plugs for Swimming or Sleeping, Available in 6 Colors
product_meta.description: Package included: 5 Pairs ear plugs+1 pcs fridge magnet
feature_bullets: Super soft silicone, easy to insert
5 Pairs in Pack so you'll never be without
